struct  PdpContextInfo
 Structure for storing a PDP context ID and its current usage state.

Detailed Description

Provides registration of PDP contexts to the system and manages all registered PDP contexts.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum PdpContextManager::ExternalContextState
 

Enumerator:
c_ext_ctx_state_invalid  Invalid state.
c_ext_ctx_state_connecting  Enter L2-protocol.
c_ext_ctx_state_connected  Start data transfer.
c_ext_ctx_state_disconnecting  Request end of data transfer.
c_ext_ctx_state_disconnected  End data transfer.

Member Function Documentation

void PdpContextManager::Attach (   )  [static]
 

Requests a GPRS attach.

BOOLEAN PdpContextManager::AttachManagerControl (  PdpContextManagerControl *  context_manager_control = 0  )  [static]
 

Attaches the specified PDP context manager control object context_manager_control to the PDP context manager. If context_manager_control is 0 then the context managers control object is reset.

PdpContext * PdpContextManager::CreateContext (  PdpContextControl &  context_control,
PdpContext *  primary_context = 0
)  [static]
 

Creates and returns a new PDP context which is attached to the specified PDP context_control. This new PDP context is owned by this context manager. If the stack runs out of resources for allocating a new context, then 0 is returned. By default a primary context will be created. If an additional primary context is specified, then a secondary context will be created which uses primary_context as its primary context. However, if the additional primary context doesn't exist or is a secondary context, then the secondary context can't be created and therefore 0 will be returned.

void PdpContextManager::Detach (   )  [static]
 

Requests a GPRS detach.

PdpContext * PdpContextManager::FindContext (  PdpContext::Id  id  )  [static]
 

Looks up if the context (primary or secondary) with the given id exists and returns it.

static const AttachStatus& PdpContextManager::GetAttachStatus (   )  [inline, static]
 

Returns the GPRS attach status.

static PdpContextControl* PdpContextManager::GetContextControl (  PdpContext *  context  )  [inline, static]
 

Retrieve the PDP context control object for the specified PDP context.

static PdpContextManagerControl* PdpContextManager::GetContextManagerControl (   )  [inline, static]
 

Retrieve the actual PDP context manager control object.

BOOLEAN PdpContextManager::GetDataCounters (  UINT32 &  sent,
UINT32 &  received
)  [static]
 

Returns the sent and received data counter from all contexts. The values represent the counted data since power-up or last resetting them using PdpContextManager::ResetDataCounters(). Please note: This method does an active wait until all counters have been read.

static void PdpContextManager::GetLastNegotiatedDnsServerAddresses (  IpAddr &  primary_dns,
IpAddr &  secondary_dns
)  [inline, static]
 

Returns the result of the last DNS server read request. This method must only be used on the PdpContext::OnReadDnsServerCompleted() callback!!!

static const DataCounters& PdpContextManager::GetLastStackDataCounters (   )  [inline, static]
 

Returns the result of the last data counter stack request. This method must only be used on the PdpContext::OnReadCounterCompleted() callback!!!

static Semaphore& PdpContextManager::GetSemaphore (   )  [inline, static, protected]
 

static State PdpContextManager::GetState (   )  [inline, static]
 

Returns the current state of the PDP context manager.

void PdpContextManager::Init (   )  [static]
 

Initializes the PDP context manager. Must only be called in the StackControl::OnPowerUp() method!!!

static BOOLEAN PdpContextManager::IsAttached (   )  [inline, static]
 

Tells if GPRS is attached or not.

void PdpContextManager::Register (   )  [static]
 

Register the interface to the PCH thread. This should be performed at startup time (PowerUp).

BOOLEAN PdpContextManager::ResetDataCounters (   )  [static]
 

Resets data counters of all contexts. Please note: This method does an active wait until all counters have been reseted.
